Label: Purpose
Replaces: To point the user to a deprecated item(s).

Label: Entry Guidelines
Replaces: Enter the ID of the deprecated item(s).

Label: Commentary
Replaces: This field can be used on its own to point to an older deprecated dataset, or it can be used with [Is Replaced By](../ogm-aardvark/#is-replaced-by) to link a revised version with its original.
